PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ações do Projeto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>OP_ACOESPROJETOS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.CATEGORIA = 1 AND ( SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS U WHERE U.HANDLE = @USUARIO AND ( U.CENTROCUSTOREQUISICAO = A.CENTROCUSTO OR U.GESTORORCAMENTOPUBLICO = 'S')) IS NOT NULL</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/OrcamentoPublico/AcoesProjetos/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>OP_ACOESPROJETOS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.CATEGORIA = 2 AND ( SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS U WHERE U.HANDLE = @USUARIO AND ( U.CENTROCUSTOREQUISICAO = A.CENTROCUSTO OR U.GESTORORCAMENTOPUBLICO = 'S')) IS NOT NULL</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/OrcamentoPublico/AcoesProjetos/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>OP_ACOESPROJETOS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.CATEGORIA = 3 AND ( SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS U WHERE U.HANDLE = @USUARIO AND ( U.CENTROCUSTOREQUISICAO = A.CENTROCUSTO OR U.GESTORORCAMENTOPUBLICO = 'S')) IS NOT NULL</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/OrcamentoPublico/AcoesProjetos/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
